publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3602 Ross Finnie: Scottish Executive Response to Foot-and-Mouth Disease Inquiries-That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations of the Lessons to be Learned, Royal Society and Royal Society of Edinburgh inquiries into foot-and-mouth disease and welcomes the Scottish Executive response which builds on their recommendations and aims to develop a framework for reducing the risk of importing infectious diseases, reducing the vulnerability of livestock and minimising the impact of any future outbreak to give better protection to Scotland's valuable livestock industry. Supported by: Allan Wilson*
